name: license-webpack-plugin

scripts.build: yarn run format && yarn run lint && yarn run clean && tsc
scripts.test: yarn run test:unit && yarn run test:e2e
scripts.test:e2e: yarn run format:e2e && yarn --cwd e2e/webpack-v4 && jest --config jest.config.e2e.js --runInBand
scripts.test:unit: yarn run build && yarn run jest
